column4: the only reason I don't like that idea is because thats like giving him the fish, not teaching him to get it ;)
usually I'd be all for tutorials on fishing poles, but flash is a PITA to get working sometimes. When he asks about a less messed-up package the instructions will be better :)
Haha, okay rww, I didn't have any issue with flash, but I guess I'm not 100% of the population, eh?
yeah... I have problems sometimes but not usually. Some people just can't get it to work at all. It works just fine for others. Flash is weird :/
